# 住宿

```{python}
#| echo: false
import folium

# 宿舍的信息
dormitories = [
    {"name": "Wohnheime E", "location": (49.257400, 7.041500), "type": "university", "icon": "https://www.uni-saarland.de/typo3conf/ext/uni_saarland/Resources/Public/Images/logo_uni_saarland.svg"},
    {"name": "Studentenwohnanlage Waldhaus", "location": (49.244890, 7.021330), "type": "university", "icon": "https://www.uni-saarland.de/typo3conf/ext/uni_saarland/Resources/Public/Images/logo_uni_saarland.svg"},
    {"name": "Studentenwohnheim Guckelsberg", "location": (49.265390, 7.040530), "type": "university", "icon": "https://www.uni-saarland.de/typo3conf/ext/uni_saarland/Resources/Public/Images/logo_uni_saarland.svg"},
    {"name": "Studentenwohnheim Rotenberg", "location": (49.235740, 7.001840), "type": "university", "icon": "https://www.uni-saarland.de/typo3conf/ext/uni_saarland/Resources/Public/Images/logo_uni_saarland.svg"}
]

# 学校的坐标
school_location = (49.2554, 7.0419)

# 创建地图,以学校的坐标为中心
map = folium.Map(location=school_location, zoom_start=14)

# 添加标记和线路
for dormitory in dormitories:
    # 添加标记
    folium.Marker(
        location=dormitory["location"],
        popup=folium.Popup(html=dormitory["name"], max_width=200),
        tooltip='Click for more information',
        icon=folium.features.CustomIcon(dormitory["icon"], icon_size=(50, 50))
    ).add_to(map)

# 显示地图
map
```
